summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UNIFY MVP iteration 2. Backend APIs are fully functional with proper authentication and authorization. Frontend loads correctly with excellent UI/UX, but has critical login form issues due to React error handling problems. University management, theme toggle, and navigation work perfectly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests

critical_bugs.issue: React runtime errors: 'Objects are not valid as a React child' when handling API error responses
critical_bugs.impact: Login functionality completely broken - users cannot authenticate
critical_bugs.error_details: Frontend tries to render error objects directly instead of extracting error messages

critical_bugs.issue: 422 status code from login API suggests incorrect request format
critical_bugs.impact: Super Admin login fails despite correct credentials

ui_bugs.issue: University and Role dropdowns have click interception issues

passed_tests: Landing page loads with proper UNIFY branding
University dropdown populates with existing universities (TEST001, TEST7E6E1E87)
Super Admin API login works (via direct API call)
Super Admin dashboard API returns correct stats (Universities: 2, Students: 0, Leads: 0, Applications: 0)
Backend authorization system working (Super Admin cannot create university staff)
University/Super Admin login type switching works
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix login form React error handling. The frontend is trying to render API error objects as React children instead of extracting error messages. Also fix login API request format - currently getting 422 errors. Login functionality is completely broken preventing access to admin features.

success_percentage.backend: 95% (All major APIs working, minor auth status code difference)
success_percentage.frontend: 60% (UI loads perfectly, navigation works, but login is broken)
